title: Coloureds
summary: Coloureds (Afrikaans: Kleurlinge or Bruinmense, lit.â€‰'Brown people') are a multiracial ethnic group native to Southern Africa who have ancestry from more than one of the various populations inhabiting the region, including Khoisan, Bantu, European, Austronesian, South Asian, or East Asian. Because of the combination of ethnicities, different families and individuals within a family may have a variety of different physical features.[7][8] Coloured was a legally defined racial classification during apartheid.[8][9]
